name: FUCK YOU THIS FORUM IS SHIT
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("forum.fantabobworld.com") {  body {background-image: url(http://www.pixenli.com/images/1437/1437504824053825600.jpg);background-size: cover;background-position: 0px 0px;background-repeat: repeat;background-attachment: fixed}  html {background-image: url(http://www.pixenli.com/images/1437/1437504824053825600.jpg);background-size: cover;background-position: 0px 0px;background-repeat: repeat;background-attachment: fixed}  #logo {background: url(http://www.pixenli.com/images/1437/1437730035021269300.png) no-repeat;}   #logo img {visibility:hidden}    body.styliumBoxed2 #StyliumWrapper {background: rgba(255,255,255,.9);}  .primaryContent {background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0)}    .node .forumNodeInfo.unread .nodeIcon, .node .categoryForumNodeInfo.unread .nodeIcon {background-image: url(http://www.pixenli.com/images/1435/1435774283018627800.png);background-position: 0px 0px}    .node .forumNodeInfo .nodeIcon, .node .categoryForumNodeInfo .nodeIcon {background-image: none}    .xenPreviewTooltip {background: white}    .xenTooltip {background-color: #6a6a6a;}  .xenTooltip .arrow {border-top: 6px solid #6a6a6a;}  .nodeDescriptionTip .arrow {border-color: transparent #6a6a6a transparent #000;}  .primaryContent a {color: #a26565}    .secondaryContent a {color: #ebe8e1}    a:link, a:visited {color: #a26565}    .sidebar .section .secondaryContent .footnote, .sidebar .section .secondaryContent .minorHeading {color: #5a3737}    #userBar .Popup .PopupControl.PopupOpen a, #userBar .Popup.PopupContainerControl.PopupOpen a {color: #a26565}    .publicControls .item.control {color: #a26565}    .node .nodeLastPost .lastThreadMeta .username, .attachment .attachmentInfo dt, .attachment .attachmentInfo dd, .LikeText .username, .footer a:hover, .footer a:active, #styliumAdvancedFooter a:hover, .footerLegal a:hover, .navTabs .navTab .tabLinks a:hover, .navTabs .navTab .tabLinks a:focus, .blockLinksList a:hover, .blockLinksList a:focus, .blockLinksList li.kbSelect a, .blockLinksList label:hover, .blockLinksList label:focus, .blockLinksList li.kbSelect label, #SignupButton .inner:hover {color: #a26565}  #styliumSetting .styliumPrimaryColor, .button.primary, .attachment .thumbnail, .PageNav a.currentPage, .PageNav a:hover, .PageNav a:focus, a.callToAction span, .sidebar .visitorPanel .stats, .xenOverlay .section .heading, .xenOverlay .sectionMain .heading, .BRML_menuHidden, .navTabs .navTab:first-child .navLink, #QuickSearch input.button.primary, #QuickSearch input.button.primary.BRML_searchButton, .navTabs .navLink .itemCount, .heading, .xenForm .formHeader, .node .subForumList li .nodeTitle a:hover, .BRML_backgroundBeforeNav, .downloadButton, .navTabs .publicTabs .navTab .navLink:hover {background-color: #26211D}    .xenOverlay.memberCard {background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.5)}    .xenOverlay.memberCard .userInfo h4 {color: white}  .xenOverlay .formOverlay .heading {background-color: #26211D}    .message .newIndicator {background-color: #26211D}    .sidebar .section.visitorPanel .visitorText {background: url(http://www.pixenli.com/images/1435/1435783487074947500.jpg);background-position: -50px -180px}    .sidebar .visitorPanel .username {text-shadow: 0px 0px 5px rgba(40,40,40,.9)}  .Menu {border-top-color: #6a6a6a;}  .node .tinyIcon {display: none}  .subHeading {background: #141414}  .textWithCount.subHeading .text {color: white}}
